attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with sufficient mobility to climb a few steps but who would benefit from fixtures to aid balance. (This includes people using walking frames and mobility aids)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have grab rails in the bathroom
Provide seating in common areas including reception area

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have step free outdoor pathways (includes picnic areas, barbecues and shelters)
Have a step free main entrance to the building and/or reception area (includes ramps or slopes with a maximum gradient of 1:14, otherwise are too steep for wheelchairs)
Have step free access to restaurant, lounge and bar
Have step free access to the conference or function room
Have doorways which are easy to open and have lever handles (doorways 850mm or wider when open and not heavy)
Have an accessible public toilet which is unlocked
Have a wheelchair accessible toilet / shower and change room
Have at least one wheelchair accessible parking space with wheelchair accessible signage clearly displayed (International standards are 3200mm wide x 2500 mm high)

productComments.commentText:
Join Stony Creek Brewing for a live performance by Boyd Ridley! 

Enjoy a relaxing afternoon with great music, craft beer, delicious burgers, and more. Their venue is dog-friendly and they have vegan options available on the menu to suit everyone. 

Book a table now and make the most of your Sunday at Stony Creek Brewing. Don't miss out on a fantastic day of music and good vibes!

보이드 리들리의 라이브 공연을 감상하며 스토니 크릭 브루잉에 합류하세요! 

멋진 음악 수제 맥주 맛있는 버거 등을 즐기며 편안한 오후를 보내세요. 이곳은 반려견 동반이 가능하며 모든 사람을 위한 채식 옵션도 메뉴에 준비되어 있습니다. 

지금 테이블을 예약하고 스토니 크릭 브루잉에서 일요일을 최대한 활용하세요. 환상적인 음악과 좋은 분위기를 놓치지 마세요!

ストーニー クリーク ブリューイングでボイド リドリーのライブ パフォーマンスを楽しみましょう。

素晴らしい音楽、クラフトビール、おいしいハンバーガーなどとともに、リラックスした午後をお楽しみください。この店は犬連れでも入店可能で、メニューにはビーガン オプションも用意されているので、どなたでもお楽しみいただけます。

今すぐテーブルを予約して、ストーニー クリーク ブリューイングで日曜日を満喫してください。音楽と楽しい雰囲気の素晴らしい一日をお見逃しなく。

Rejoignez Stony Creek Brewing pour une performance live de Boyd Ridley !

Profitez d'un après-midi de détente avec de la bonne musique, de la bière artisanale, de délicieux hamburgers et bien plus encore. Leur lieu accepte les chiens et propose des options végétaliennes au menu pour tous les goûts.

Réservez une table dès maintenant et profitez au maximum de votre dimanche à Stony Creek Brewing. Ne manquez pas une journée fantastique de musique et de bonnes vibrations !

加入 Stony Creek Brewing 啤酒廠，欣賞博伊德·里德利 (Boyd Ridley) 的現場表演！ 

享受美妙的音樂、精釀啤酒、美味的漢堡等，度過一個輕鬆的下午。他們的場地對狗友好，菜單上有素食選項，適合每個人。 

立即預訂餐桌，充分享受 Stony Creek Brewing 的周日時光。不要錯過美妙的音樂和美好氛圍的一天！

Junte-se à Stony Creek Brewing para uma apresentação ao vivo de Boyd Ridley! 

Aproveite uma tarde relaxante com ótima música, cerveja artesanal, hambúrgueres deliciosos e muito mais. O local aceita cães e eles têm opções veganas disponíveis no menu para atender a todos. 

Reserve uma mesa agora e aproveite ao máximo seu domingo na Stony Creek Brewing. Não perca um dia fantástico de música e boas vibrações!

加入 Stony Creek Brewing，欣赏 Boyd Ridley 的现场表演！

享受一个轻松的下午，欣赏美妙的音乐、精酿啤酒、美味汉堡等。他们的场地允许带狗，菜单上有适合每个人的素食选择。

现在就预订餐桌，在 Stony Creek Brewing 尽情享受您的周日时光。不要错过美妙的音乐和美好氛围！

Unisciti a Stony Creek Brewing per un'esibizione dal vivo di Boyd Ridley! 

Goditi un pomeriggio rilassante con ottima musica, birra artigianale, deliziosi hamburger e molto altro. Il loro locale accetta cani e hanno opzioni vegane disponibili nel menu per soddisfare tutti. 

Prenota un tavolo ora e sfrutta al meglio la tua domenica a Stony Creek Brewing. Non perderti una fantastica giornata di musica e buone vibrazioni!

Bergabunglah dengan Stony Creek Brewing untuk pertunjukan langsung oleh Boyd Ridley! 

Nikmati sore yang santai dengan musik yang asyik, bir buatan sendiri, burger yang lezat, dan banyak lagi. Tempat mereka ramah anjing dan mereka menyediakan pilihan vegan di menu untuk semua orang. 

Pesan meja sekarang dan manfaatkan hari Minggu Anda sebaik-baiknya di Stony Creek Brewing. Jangan lewatkan hari yang fantastis dengan musik dan suasana yang menyenangkan!

Besuchen Sie Stony Creek Brewing für einen Liveauftritt von Boyd Ridley! 

Genießen Sie einen entspannten Nachmittag mit toller Musik, Craft Beer, leckeren Burgern und vielem mehr. Das Lokal ist hundefreundlich und auf der Speisekarte stehen vegane Optionen für jeden Geschmack. 

Reservieren Sie jetzt einen Tisch und machen Sie das Beste aus Ihrem Sonntag bei Stony Creek Brewing. Verpassen Sie nicht einen fantastischen Tag voller Musik und guter Stimmung!

¡Únete a Stony Creek Brewing para disfrutar de una actuación en directo de Boyd Ridley! 

Disfruta de una tarde relajante con buena música, cerveza artesanal, deliciosas hamburguesas y mucho más. El local admite perros y tiene opciones veganas disponibles en el menú para todos los gustos. 

Reserva una mesa ahora y aprovecha al máximo tu domingo en Stony Creek Brewing. ¡No te pierdas un fantástico día de música y buen rollo!
